attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the government are proposing to make motorists pay £3.300 extra to buy a new car. and tripling fuel duty.the public have a right to have proof that there is global warming.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
